verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.) O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Thou didst show <S%H7521><s%> favor <S%H7521><s%> to Thy land; <S%H776><s%> Thou didst restore <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Thou didst forgive <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of Thy people; <S%H5971><s%> Thou didst cover <S%H3680><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their sin. <S%H9128><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Thou didst withdraw <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Thy fury; <S%H5678><s%> Thou didst turn <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H7725><s%> from Thy burning <S%H2740><s%> anger. <S%H639><s%>
Restore <S%H7725><s%> us, O God <S%H430><s%> of our salvation, <S%H3468><s%> And cause Thine indignation <S%H3708><s%> toward <S%H5973><s%> us to cease. <S%H6565><s%>
Wilt Thou be angry <S%H599><s%> with us forever <S%H5769><s%>? Wilt Thou prolong <S%H4900><s%> Thine anger <S%H639><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>?
Wilt Thou not Thyself <S%H859><s%> revive <S%H2421><s%> us again, <S%H7725><s%> That Thy people <S%H5971><s%> may rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in Thee?
Show <S%H7200><s%> us Thy lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And grant <S%H5414><s%> us Thy salvation. <S%H3468><s%>

I will hear <S%H8085><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> God <S%H410><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will say; <S%H1696><s%> For He will speak <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to His people, <S%H5971><s%> to His godly <S%H2623><s%> ones; <S%H2623><s%> But let them not turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> to folly. <S%H3690><s%>
Surely <S%H389><s%> His salvation <S%H3468><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him, That glory <S%H9202><s%> may dwell <S%H7931><s%> in our land. <S%H776><s%>
Lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> have met <S%H6298><s%> together; Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> and peace <S%H7965><s%> have kissed <S%H5401><s%> each other.
Truth <S%H571><s%> springs <S%H6779><s%> from the earth; <S%H776><s%> And righteousness <S%H6664><s%> looks <S%H8259><s%> down <S%H8259><s%> from heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
Indeed, <S%H1571><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> what <S%H9185><s%> is good; <S%H9185><s%> And our land <S%H776><s%> will yield <S%H5414><s%> its produce. <S%H2981><s%>
Righteousness <S%H6664><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him, And will make <S%H7760><s%> His footsteps <S%H6471><s%> into a way. <S%H1870><s%>
